snippet.title: blooper
snippet.description: English Pronunciation Rhymes: -uːpə(ɹ) Noun blooper (plural bloopers) (informal) An error. (baseball, slang

snippet.title: goof
snippet.description: (prison jargon) A child molester. Synonyms (error): blooper, boo-boo, error, faux pas, fluff, gaffe, lapse

snippet.title: lapse
snippet.description: apostasy. Synonyms (a temporary failure, slip): blooper, blunder, boo-boo, defect, error, fault, faux pas
